title: Looking For Top, Mid, Sup, Jg For Ranked 5v5 Team Bronze-Silver Only
body:
**I need the info**
Skype:
Curse:
Ign:
Main Champions Played:

**Please Read**
Hello, I really plan for this to be a serious team and something you should know is I don't play with flamers I understand you may get frustrated But its OK we the team are always there for you so don't treat it as solo Q but as a family playing together. There will be schedules that we need to stick to. Right now there are still rules and stuff being made but we can stick together and actually do this.

**My Ign**
Beastlychaac
Team Name: Join The Glory
